property.name: LINE_END_ALL_ONE_HALF_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Uses half-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_UKE_ONE_HALF_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one space and uses line end uke one half space.

property.name: ONE_OR_ONE_HALF_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_UKE_ONE_HALF_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full or half space and uses line end uke one half space.

property.name: ONE_OR_ONE_HALF_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_ALL_ONE_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Uses full-witdh spacing for all characters except the last character in the line, which uses either full- or half-width spacing.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_ALL_ONE_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full space and uses full-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_ALL_NO_FLOAT_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full space and uses no float for all characters.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_UKE_NO_FLOAT_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full space and uses line end uke no float.

property.name: ONE_OR_ONE_HALF_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_UKE_NO_FLOAT_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one half space or one full space and uses line end uke no float.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_ALL_ONE_HALF_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full space and uses half-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: LINE_END_ALL_ONE_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Uses full-width spacing for all characters.

property.name: LINE_END_UKE_NO_FLOAT_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Uses line end uke no float.

property.name: ONE_OR_ONE_HALF_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_PERIOD_ONE_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one or one-half space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.

property.name: ONE_EM_INDENT_LINE_END_PERIOD_ONE_EM_ENUM
property.shortdesc: Indents lines one full space and uses full-width spacing for punctuation and for the last character in the line.

property.name: TRAD_CHINESE_DEFAULT
property.shortdesc: Uses mojikumi tsume and aki optimized for Traditional Chinese centered punctuation glyphs.

property.name: SIMP_CHINESE_DEFAULT
property.shortdesc: Uses mojikumi tsume and aki optimized for Simplified Chinese punctuation glyphs.
